record.title: PROVIDING FOR CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 1257, SHAREHOLDER VOTE ON EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION ACT
record.chair: The unfinished business is the vote on ordering the previous question on House Resolution 301, on which the yeas and nays are ordered.
record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the resolution.
record.chair: The question is on ordering the previous question.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, because I was attending a funeral at West Point this morning, I missed rollcall No. 219, adoption of previous question for H. Res. 301: Providing for consideration of H.R. 1257, to amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to provide shareholders with an advisory vote on executive compensation. Had I been present, I would have voted "nay."

record.chair: The question is on the resolution.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I demand a recorded vote.

Mr. Speaker, because I was attending a funeral at West Point this morning, I missed rollcall No. 220, adoption of H. Res. 301: Providing for consideration of H.R. 1257, to amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to provide shareholders with an advisory vote on executive compensation. Had I been present, I would have voted "nay."
